## trim() function

Trims all the strings in a string array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function trim(strings: string[], filter?: (trimmedString: string) => boolean): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  strings | string\[\] | The strings to trim. |
|  filter | (trimmedString: string) =&gt; boolean | An optional filter to prevent strings strings from being added. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]
